title: Can't sign in to my PBE account on the client?
body: I can't seem to sign in on the PBE servers. Tried yesterday, and I would either get A) Incorrect password even though it is correct or B) "Unable to connect to login queue". Today, it's saying that my password is incorrect.

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your account and It looks like your PBE account _is_ still active so that's good. If it's saying that your password is wrong, it could be from using the password for your main account by mistake, or that account may have been 'hacked' and had the password changed =\ . 

Double check to make sure that the password is the right one, and if not let's be safe and make sure your account is secured by using our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).

Can you please pull my account up as well? its NOTdankle4n, its saying the same for my password even though ive typed it right and I have the same password for both my live and PBE account {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Hey, I cant log in my PBE account. I have just created it. I tried changing my password, but it didnt work. Its says inccorect password or username but its not i checked it a lot of times. Please help!

is there any chance that i could get my user name and password (for my PBE account) given to me _again_?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
i cant get onto my pbe account either it says my user name is incorrect and i am logging in with my stuff like i would log into the live servers
